INSERT INTO park_monthly(monthly_id, parkinglot_id, room_number, owner_name, phone, monthly_type, timerule_id, car_license, occupy_num, monthly_amount, monthly_space, category_id, remarks) VALUES (#{monthlyId}, #{parkingLotId}, #{roomNumber}, #{ownerName}, #{phone}, #{monthlyType}, #{timeRuleId}, #{carLicense}, #{occupyNum}, #{monthlyAmount}, #{monthlySpace}, #{categoryId}, #{remarks})
mapper.select: SELECT monthly_id, m.parkinglot_id, room_number, owner_name, phone, monthly_type, timerule_id, car_license, occupy_num, monthly_amount, monthly_space, remarks, c.category_name FROM park_monthly m LEFT JOIN park_car_category c ON m.category_id = c.category_id WHERE m.parkinglot_id = #{parkingLotId} AND monthly_type = #{monthlyType} AND (room_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%') OR owner_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%') OR car_license LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%') OR monthly_space LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInfo}, '%'))
